item.description:
Please bring your e-ticket with you to this matinee taping of Says You! From the Says You! website:

********************

Says You! Current News

December 27, 2012

By now, all ticket purchasers should have been issued e-tickets for our December 29 and December 30, 2012 tapings in Weston, MA.  Again, we issued E-TICKETS ONLY- do not look for them in snail mail.  Please check your e-mail if they are not at hand- they are labeled as ‘Says You! Tickets.’

If you cannot find them or have deleted them, simply contact us HERE.  Please include any ordering information you may have in the ‘Question’ box and we will respond quickly.  We ask that you do not call Regis College since they will have no way to track any purchases. 

Information and directions to the venue are on the e-ticket.  Please note that these are sold out performances and no tickets will be available at the door for either show.  Thanks so much to our listeners for their incredible support.

********************

If the link in the message above doesn't work, use the link in the "green" paragraph below and click on the "LEARN MORE" link at the top of the Says You! webpage.

See you tomorrow!

********************

As of Sunday, October 21, 2012, both reserved and general admission tickets are SOLD OUT. If you do not have a ticket from Says You! you cannot attend this event. Please update your RSVPs accordingly.

WGBH's radio program Says You!( http://www.saysyou.net ) travels the country taping radio shows in front of a live audience. This holiday season, Pipit and Finch (the program's creators) will be taping at Regis College in Weston, Massachusetts. I attended a taping of Says You! last year, and it was so much fun. And funny, too. Word nerds will definitely appreciate the Says You! brand of humor. If you're a fan of the show, you know exactly what I mean!

I have purchased a ticket for myself, as follows: Sunday, December 30, 2012, 1:00 p.m. performance (I plan to be there by 12:15 p.m.), General Admission (ticket price is $24.00). Two shows will be taped, with an intermission between them. We can catch up during the intermission, too.

Please note: You must purchase a ticket to get into the live taping. Go to http://www.saysyou.net and click on the "Join the Fun" link for more information about purchasing tickets. You will receive the address and directions, too, once you purchase a ticket. Please let me know in the comments sections whether you have your ticket.

My plan is to arrive early (by 12:15 p.m.) to get a spot in line. The taping includes both reserved seating and general admission tickets; I purchased a general admission ticket. We can meet in line to sit together. Look for me and my red backpack and meetup sign. If you don't arrive early enough to join me in line (I don't recommend cutting the line), look for me in the auditorium. We can find each other during the intermission: I'll still have the red backpack and meetup sign!

Marianne
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me and my bright red backpack and meetup sign. See the event description for more information.
item.name: Live Taping of Says You! -- Matinee on Dec. 30, 2012 -- Tickets Are SOLD OUT
